backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required Page 2 text updates in storyContent.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for key frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with three routes and provides the router to the app.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveLette: Interactive letter component handling open animation and rendering text from storyContent.
frontend/src/components/TulipRainOverlay: Generates and animates falling tulip emojis with randomized properties.
frontend/src/content/storyContent.ts: Centralized text content for all pages including updated Page 2 birthday message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via React Query, updating on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context providing login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for React Query hooks with no current backend usage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a custom OKLCH color theme with light/dark modes plus utility animations and keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Page1.tsx: Renders the garden scene intro with an interactive letter that opens and navigates to Page 2.
frontend/src/pages/Page2.tsx: Displays a gated birthday message page that requires Page 1 visit and includes a button to continue to Page 3.
frontend/src/pages/Page3.tsx: Gated page featuring a spell-casting animation that transitions to a final black screen with a message and tulip rain.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH theme variables, garden color palette, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, requirements, and current implementation state for the multi-page birthday experience.
